description: This file defines the 'NotesListScreen' widget for a Flutter app. It constructs the user interface for displaying a list of notes, including a search bar, filter options, a refresh indicator, and a floating button to add new notes. It interacts with the NotesProvider for state management and uses various imported custom widgets and models.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a list of notes with search and filter functionalities, and provides a button to add new notes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the user interface for the notes list screen, including app bar, search, notes list, and add note button.
